HEADER.NAME: Trinh Thanh Tung
HEADER.WHO_CONTENT: Web Developer focused on turning your ideas into high-performing, scalable systems.
HEADER.PAST_CONTENT_1: Over 4 years of experience building modern web applications with a focus on clean architecture and performance optimization.
HEADER.PAST_CONTENT_2: Contributed to production-ready systems for international markets like Singapore, Malaysia, and New Zealand.
HEADER.NOW_FRONTEND_DESC: Expertise in the Angular ecosystem and TypeScript, turning complex ideas into high-performance, scalable web solutions with a focus on clean architecture.
HEADER.NOW_PROBLEM_DESC: Strong debugging skills, ability to optimize UI performance and clear workflows.
HEADER.NOW_AI_DESC: Applying advanced AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini) to boost productivity and accelerate development tasks.
HEADER.NOW_COLLAB_DESC: Proven ability to lead and collaborate across teams to ensure high-quality, timely production deliveries.

PHILOSOPHY.TITLE: Core Philosophy
PHILOSOPHY.HIGHLIGHT: Everything starts with a single clean line of code -
PHILOSOPHY.DESC: I believe that even the largest systems can be built on the foundation of Clean Architecture and the modularity of Micro Frontends. My focus is on turning complex UI/UX visions into high-performing technical realities, ensuring every function is optimized and every pixel serves a clear purpose for the long term.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Joined Projects
PROJECTS.REDOC_DESC: Digitalizing the real estate lifecycle through automated contract generation and secure online signing.
PROJECTS.LOYALTY_DESC: Built a booking and management system for user authentication and loyalty point tracking within service groups.
PROJECTS.OMSIM_DESC: Developed a web ordering solution to optimize and automate operational processes for customer care teams, allowing Sales Reps and customers to manage orders, inventory, and approvals efficiently.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESC_1: I help you build scalable products and clean architectures.
CONTACT.DESC_2: I dedicate 4 hours of "deep work" daily to ship high-quality code for your MVP.
